BR_text.BRsummary: OpenCV 3.2 build fails - stitching module can't find cudawarping.hpp
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
 
 
 OpenCV => 3.2
 Operating System / Platform => Win 7 x64
 Compiler => VS 2013
 
 <denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
 
 The opencv_stitching project fails to build because it cannot find cudawarping.hpp.  The include path for cudawarping is missing from the project settings.  Adding opencv_cudawarping to the list of optional modules in CMakeLists.txt for the stitching module seemed to fix it but I'm relatively new at this so I don't know if there could be other ramifications for modifying that file.
 <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
 
 Here is my CMake output & config.
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/files/936195/CMake.Output.txt>CMake Output.txt</denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/files/936155/CMakeVars.txt>CMakeVars.txt</denchmark-link>
